author: hlship
msg: Add support for the <t:parameter> element, to binding parameters of type Block.
Add an else parameter (type Block) to the If component.

author: kenney
msg: * changed the ScmCvsExeWagonTest to extend from the abstractCVS wagon test, so it actually
* disabled CVS testing because that is broken - it probably never worked.
* Enabled all unit tests in the WagonTestCase (removed dummy overrides in AbstractScmWagonTest),
and fixed the implementation so all tests pass. Removed the use of provider.getParent
* had to update deps to cvs/svn scm's since I had to implement the list functionality
